name: Emily Roberts
bio: Emily leads the creative team with over 10 years of experience in digital design and branding. She has worked on award-winning projects for global clients.

name: James Carter
bio: James specializes in full-stack development and has a passion for building scalable web applications. He is proficient in modern JavaScript frameworks.

name: Sophia Martinez
bio: Sophia crafts innovative marketing campaigns that drive engagement. Her expertise lies in digital marketing and data-driven strategies.

name: Michael Brown
bio: Michael creates intuitive user experiences and stunning visual designs. He believes in user-centric design and seamless interactions.

name: Ava Patel
bio: Ava ensures that all projects are delivered on time and exceed client expectations. She excels in agile methodologies and team coordination.
